document_data.name: Cool
document_data.Effects: A caster used this spell to feel comfortable in extreme temperatures, such as the heat of a desert or the oppressive humidity of a jungle. It was often used when a caster had to travel through these areas. The also also offered a bare minimum of protection against natural and magical heat sources.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]]s, some down feathers from a duck.
